response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its high value and potential impact on your business, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $11,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its market value of $12,000, while still ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 11000}
